data.title: Drena De Niro - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Drena De Niro: her birthday, what she did before fame, her family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

Actress who kicked off her career with appearances in films like Grace of My Heart, Wag the Dog, and Great Expectations. In 2007, she starred in the Portuguese drama film The Lovebirds. Her television credits include NYC 22, Boardwalk Empire, and Mozart in the Jungle.

Before Fame

She was a musical supervisor for Giorgio Armani's runway shows before she launched her acting career.

Trivia

She and her fellow actors in Cabaret Maxime received a Best Ensemble nomination at the 2019 CinEuphoria Awards. She was a guest on a 2021 episode of The Up & Adam Show.

Family Life

She is the daughter of actress Diahnne Abbott. Actor Robert De Niro became her adoptive father after he married her mother in the year 1976.

Associated With
